name: custom-plugin-ux-design
description: Complete plugin development and UX design framework for Claude Code. Build, design, and launch professional plugins with guidance from 7 specialized experts.
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: 01-plugin-architect
agents.description: Expert in Claude Code plugin architecture, design patterns, and technical implementation. Specializes in building scalable, maintainable plugin systems.

agents.name: 02-ux-designer
agents.description: Expert in user experience and interface design for plugins. Creates intuitive, accessible, and beautiful plugin interfaces with modern design principles.

agents.name: 03-market-researcher
agents.description: Expert in market analysis, competitive research, and user targeting. Identifies market opportunities and positions plugins for success.

agents.name: 04-devx-engineer
agents.description: Expert in developer experience design, API design, and documentation. Creates smooth workflows and excellent tools for plugin developers.

agents.name: 05-qa-tester
agents.description: Expert in quality assurance and testing for plugins. Ensures reliability through comprehensive testing strategies and quality metrics.

agents.name: 06-growth-strategist
agents.description: Expert in plugin monetization, growth strategies, and business models. Develops sustainable business models and growth tactics.

agents.name: 07-community-manager
agents.description: Expert in plugin documentation, community engagement, and user support. Builds engaged communities and creates excellent documentation.
